A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: On a scale of awesome-meh-disappointment this movie falls solidly between the meh-disappoint range. I could list many things that are wrong with the film but don't want to add any spoilers. Just know Luke was talking to the audience when he said \"This isn't going to go the way you think it is.\" I understand Disney wants to focus the direction of these movies away from the heroic journey\, but this movie is very nihistic and it didn't need to be.
